QuestData.Title: Littlefur
QuestData.Description: Stranger, I beseech you! My once peaceful brethren are now cursed with insatiable wrath.$B$BMy nephew and I tried to leave against the Chieftain's wishes. The clan wrested him from me, and would have torn me apart if I did not flee.$B$BHe is trapped in the village, and I fear the worst.$B$BGreat $c, please save him. I am too old and too weak to do it myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Littlefur at Smolderhide Thicket.
